title: Hakuchouki: Douyatte Goku wo Yaburi, Dousureba Kimi ga Warau no ka
original_name: 白蝶記 ―どうやって獄を破り、どうすれば君が笑うのか―
sinopse: Three friends: Asahi, Itsuki and Hisaki, grey up in a cult facility and spent their days rebelling against cult rules in order to survive the cruel environment. But one day, a certain incident made Asahi determined to leave that prison...
